Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory802.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hello, everyone! The Double Seventh Festival Radio is starting, give me some applause!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Today, we have a special guest joining me. Any guesses who it is?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hehe, that's right. It's none other than the Gray Raven Commandant, 【kuroname】. Care to introduce yourself to everyone?", 4: '1'}

{3: "You glance around. It's an inconspicuous corner of the festival grounds. While you were resting, Nanami suddenly popped out and brought over a small table, apparently trying to recreate an old-style radio broadcast."}
{3: "The table's storage compartment is packed full. Who knows what's inside."}
{2: "What's going on?", 3: '15', 4: "Hello everyone, I'm MC Gray Raven.", 5: '17'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Looks like the Commandant is a little shy as a first-timer. But that's fine, I'm sure everyone already knows you.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hehe, that's my Commandant, you just get it!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami is as quirky as ever.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Ding ding ding! Ads are over. Now it's time for our guest Q&A.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Before we knew it, the Double Seventh Festival is here again. How's your day so far?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just getting started.', 3: '25', 4: "It's been great.", 5: '27'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Really? So Nanami's one of the first to find you today?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Looks that way, since you were just taking a break.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Back to the festival. As everyone knows, it's a day for sharing feelings and appreciation. Naturally, merchants go all out creating anything they can sell on this day.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's right, our theme today is the Double Seventh Festival Gift Showcase!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Clap clap clap!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She mimics applause with her mouth while opening the storage compartment, revealing a pile of so-called gifts.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hmm, which one first... ah, I know.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The compartment is like a bottomless bag; no matter how much she rummages, it seems endless. Then, with a quick pull, she produces something sticky.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Smooth, squishy texture, and such an adorably silly look. I present the festival's finest creation...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'The Squishy Hetero-Creature Stress Ball!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Who would buy that?', 3: '46', 4: '—"A slow-recovery silicone toy!"', 5: '48'}
{3: "You can't help commenting. Forget the morbid concept—it looks disturbingly realistic, enough to fool someone from a distance. But would anyone actually buy this stuff?"}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Looks like you don't like it. Oh well, everything has its audience. I only grabbed it because it was nearly sold out, and the vendor swore it's top-tier stress relief.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As she speaks, she punches it, making the fake Hetero-Creature guts squish out from holes in its surface.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'See? Stress relief, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: "...Is everyone's mental health okay here?", 3: '55', 4: "Let's move on.", 5: '55'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Guess this one's out, but Nanami won't give up over a little setback!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Alright, listeners, next up in our gift showcase!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Ding ding ding! The Corrupted Guillotine!', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Nanami', 3: "According to the vendor, this isn't just a display piece—it's also a party game. See these six switches? Only one will actually trigger the guillotine and lop off the Corrupted's head.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I'll go first... okay, all safe! Your turn, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Alright, let's see...", 3: '66', 4: 'Is this supposed to be the Double Seventh Festival or Halloween...', 5: '71'}
{3: "The moment you press it, the blade slams down, cleanly severing the toy Corrupted's head, which sails several meters through the air."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "It might look a bit weird, but it's a top seller too. I just thought it was fun, so I bought one.", 4: '1'}
{3: "She presses another switch, and the blade slams down, cleanly severing the toy Corrupted's head, which sails several meters through the air."}
{3: 'You stare at the airborne head for a few seconds in silence before Nanami turns to you.'}
{2: 'Sorry.', 3: '81', 4: "Can't give that a high score.", 5: '81', 6: 'Absolutely not!', 7: '83'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'H-how could this be? All the gifts I prepared so carefully are failing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I worked so hard to collect them, and you don't like a single one...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As she speaks, she slumps forward onto the little table like a deflated balloon.'}
{2: 'Wait, were these all meant to be for me?', 3: '88'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Mm-hmm. I wasn't sure what you'd like, so I bought everything I saw.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I was planning to use this festival radio to figure out your favorite, and then...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hehe, bet you didn't see that coming. This is my Double Seventh gift to you. I wanted to surprise you like this.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She calls out to her imaginary radio audience for help.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Dear listeners, what should I do? My gifts are all going to waste.', 4: '1'}
{2: "As long as it's from you, I like it.", 3: '99'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Eh, r-really?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "So you'll take the Hetero-Creature stress ball and the Corrupted guillotine?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'What about this Babylonia spinning top? And this Serum Cola?!', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Nod)', 3: '108', 4: 'Do these even count as Double Seventh gifts?', 5: '108'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hehe, I knew it! No one in the world treats me better than you do, Commandant.', 4: '1'}

{3: 'After a full-on gift-giving frenzy, it feels like she has emptied that mysterious storage space of hers completely. The Double Seventh presents she pulls out are stacked into a little mountain on the table, and Nanami stands on top of it, looking as pleased with herself as if she has just pulled off some grand feat.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Alright, last gift of the night. You better be ready to catch it, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Catch it?', 3: '115', 4: '(Brace for impact)', 5: '115'}
{3: 'Nanami suddenly leaps off the table, crashing into you and sending both of you tumbling into the pile of gifts.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Ta-da! The final gift, called "Swimming in an Ocean of Happiness". Pretty good name, right?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pleased with her own creativity, she bounces twice on the gift pile.'}
{3: 'The already unstable mound creaks under the extra movement, then starts to give way.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest01.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest02.prefab'}
{3: 'The last thing you see before everything goes black is fake Hetero-Creature innards flying through the air. So a whole bunch of them were hiding in that pile of gifts...'}
{2: "Nanami... I... can't... breathe... ugh...", 3: '129'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Ghh, I'm... not gonna make it...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'It has been ages since you last heard her say the line she always used back when you first met.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '1', 2: '<size=50>Double Seventh Festival Radio</size>', 4: '50', 6: '1', 11: '1'}
{3: 'Double Seventh Festival Radio. The End.'}
